'''''The Flowing Primal Flame''''' is part of {{Quest|The Tonatiuh Quivers}}.

==Steps==
# Retrieve the Firestone(s) on the lower level of the northwestern floating island
# Catch up with the [[Secret Source Sentinel]] that took the Firestone(s) away
# Bring the Firestone(s) back to the Altar

==Description==
{{Quest Description|According to Bona, you need to collect burning Firestones and offer them up to the Altar of Primal Flame if you wish to find the Jade of Return...}}
